title: Kalista Main, (Unranked) Looking for a support main to push with & chill with (Duo)
body:
Im a fairly new player to the game, only hitting rank 30 a few days ago, but i think im pretty good with kalista, im just looking for a support that i can push with cause most games i have to solo carry anyway. Would be fun to have a support that isn't too try hard but can play properly when we need. hmu boys (idc support as long as ya got good cc) e.g.  

also can discord if need be. 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Thresh main, Silver 2 last season (peaked gold 5 about august), won't be this account, since its banned, but i'll chuck you an add on my new account

SkyStorm = IGN
I’d be down for duo queuing when season 8 hits, I’m a Leona main but can play most tanky cc based sups
yeah alright im down to play a bit, im about silver 5 now
I'm a Rakan main, would be happy to add you and play some later today. What timezone are you in?
AEST i can play from 5~-8~depending on the work load
Cool I can play from about 4 aest and play one or two game, I'll give you an add tomorrow :)
